column5: Land Big Fish is opening a store in Akron Ohio, Coventry Town Plaza 3333 Manchester Road(rte 93)  1-330-644-8211. Only store front they have that I know of, a card in the mail today, 8000 square foot fishing tackle only store. 100 feet of zoom lures, 60 feet of berkley. Grand Opening Saturday September 22nd 9am to 7 pm.  If your in that area and didn`t get a card a heads up.
